title: The City of women = La Citta delle donne
creator_credit: Opera Film Produzione, Gaumont-British Instructional and Federico Fellini
brief_description: When Snaporaz (Marcello Mastroianni) follows an attractive woman off a train she leads him into the midst of a feminist seminar. So begins a fantastic journey as Mastroianni’s Don Juan finds himself meeting a bizarre coterie of female characters. In “La citta delle donne” Fellini confronts feminism in all its guises. Fellini is at once self-critical and indulgent but, as usual, his wonderful sense of fantasy makes this an enjoyable film to watch. In Italian with English subtitles. Note:During last 10 minutes of film some white lines may appear on screen. Adjust tracking on video player.
